thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 12 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Canadian PM says optimistic three NAFTA nations can agree on improvements to treaty

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Canadian PM says optimistic three NAFTA nations can agree on improvements to treaty
text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) -
* CANADIAN PM, PRESSED ABOUT TRUMP‘S MOST RECENT COMMENTS ON NAFTA, SAYS APPROACH HASN‘T CHANGED: WE WILL NOT JUST ACCEPT ANY DEAL
* CANADIAN PM NOTES THAT MORE AND MORE AMERICANS ARE SPEAKING OUT IN FAVOR OF NAFTA; SAYS PREPARED FOR ANYTHING, HAS CONTIGENCY PLANS
* CANADIAN PM SAYS OPTIMISTIC THREE NAFTA NATIONS CAN AGREE ON IMPROVEMENTS TO TREATY (Reporting by David Ljunggren)
